mapper.select: SELECT ID, MEM_CD, NAME, EMAIL, TEL, IDNTT, MEM_CONTENT, AREA_NAME, SPC_AREA_NAME, IMG_URL , JOIN_DATE , PWD FROM VIEW_MEM_MY
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM TBL_MEM_JOIN
SELECT NAME, MEM_CD FROM TBL_MEM_JOIN WHERE MEM_ID=#{id} AND PWD=CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{pwd},#{pwd})
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM VIEW_MEM_BLK WHERE ID = (SELECT ID FROM VIEW_MEM_STOP WHERE ID = #{id})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEM_INT_TAG(MEM_INT_TAG_CD, MEM_CD, INT_TAG_CD) VALUES('MEIT'||SEQ_MEM_INT_TAG.NEXTVAL, #{mem_cd}, #{int_tag})
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(SINCERITY)/COUNT(*) AS SINCERITY, SUM(EMBRACE)/COUNT(*) AS EMBRACE , SUM(COMMUNICATION)/COUNT(*) AS COMMUNICATION, SUM(SKILL)/COUNT(*) AS SKILL , SUM(LEADERSHIP)/COUNT(*) AS LEADERSHIP FROM VIEW_STU_EVAL WHERE MEM_CD = #{mem_cd} GROUP BY ID
SELECT INT_TAG FROM ( SELECT MEM_CD, ID, INT_TAG FROM VIEW_MEM_INTTAG UNION ALL SELECT MEM_CD, ID, ETC_TAG FROM VIEW_MEM_ETCTAG ) WHERE MEM_CD = #{mem_cd}
SELECT STU_TITLE AS JOIN_STU_TITLE FROM VIEW_MY_STU WHERE END_DATE > SYSDATE AND MEM_CD = #{mem_cd}
